00040 require_once("../../include.inc.php");
00041 
00042 function set_pfhost_writeable ($name)
00043 {
00044   global $database;
00045   
00046   $db  = sqlite_popen($database);
00047   $results = sqlite_query("select * from pfhosts where name='". sqlite_escape_string($name) ."'", $db);
00048   $pfhost_check = sqlite_fetch_array($results, SQLITE_ASSOC);
00049   if ($pfhost_check['can_connect'] == "false") {
00050     $results = sqlite_query("update pfhosts set can_connect='true' where name='". sqlite_escape_string($name) ."'", $db);
00051   }
00052   sqlite_close($db);
00053 }
00054 
00055 function set_pfhost_nonwritable ($name)
00056 {
00057   global $database;
00058   
00059   $db  = sqlite_popen($database);
00060   $results = sqlite_query("select * from pfhosts where name='". sqlite_escape_string($name) ."'", $db);
00061   $pfhost_check = sqlite_fetch_array($results, SQLITE_ASSOC);
00062   if ($pfhost_check['can_connect'] == "true") {
00063     $results = sqlite_query("update pfhosts set can_connect='false' where name='". sqlite_escape_string($name) ."'", $db);
00064   }
00065   sqlite_close($db);  
00066 }
00067 
00068 if (count($_POST)) {
00069   $dbw  = sqlite_popen($database);
00070   if ($_GET['id']) {
00071     $sql  = "update pfhosts set ";
00072     $sql .= "name='". sqlite_escape_string($_POST['name']). "', ";
00073     $sql .= "connect='". sqlite_escape_string($_POST['connect']). "', ";
00074     $sql .= "master='". sqlite_escape_string($_POST['master']). "' ";
00075     $sql .= "where id='". sqlite_escape_string($_GET['id']). "'";
00076   } else {
00077     $sql  = "insert into pfhosts (name, connect, master) values ";
00078     $sql .= "('". sqlite_escape_string($_POST['name']). "', '". sqlite_escape_string($_POST['connect']). "', ";
00079     $sql .= "'". sqlite_escape_string($_POST['master']). "')";
00080   }
00081 
00082   sqlite_query($sql, $dbw);
00083   sqlite_close($dbw);
00084   
00085   if (!$_GET['id']) {
00086     $db = sqlite_popen($database);
00087     $results = sqlite_query("select * from pfhosts where name='". sqlite_escape_string($_POST['name']) ."'", $db);
00088     $pfhost = sqlite_fetch_array($results, SQLITE_ASSOC);
00089     sqlite_close($db);
00090     header("Location: ". $_SERVER['PHP_SELF']. "?id=". $pfhost['id']);
00091   }
00092 }
00093 
00094 if ($_GET['id']) {
00095   $db = sqlite_popen($database);
00096   $results = sqlite_query("select * from pfhosts where id='". sqlite_escape_string($_GET['id']) ."'", $db);
00097   $pfhost = sqlite_fetch_array($results, SQLITE_ASSOC);
00098   sqlite_close($db);  
00099 }
00100 
00101 $db = sqlite_popen($database);
00102 $results = sqlite_query("select * from pfhosts", $db);
00103 while ($row = sqlite_fetch_array($results, SQLITE_ASSOC)) {
00104   $pfhosts[] = $row;
00105 }
00106 sqlite_close($db);

00157 <?php
00158 if ($pfhost['connect'] && ($pfhost['connect'] != "localhost")) {
00159   print "<h2>Connection testing</h2>";
00160   
00162   $View->Controller($Output, 'GetPfwCmdWrapperConntest', $pfhost['connect']);
00163   $result= implode("\n", $Output);
00164   
00165   if ($result == "connected") {
00166     print "<h3 style=\"color: green\">Successfully connected to ". $pfhost['name']. " using \"". $pfhost['connect']. "\"</h3>";
00167     set_pfhost_writeable($pfhost['name']);
00168   } else {
00169     print "<h3 style=\"color: red\">Error when connecting: ". $result. "</h3>";
00170     print "<div style=\"border: 1px solid red; width: 50%; padding: 1em; color: red; font-size: 120%; line-height: 1.5em;\">";
00171     print "Please login as root and make sure that it's possible to login without using a password and try again.";
00172     print "</div>";
00173     set_pfhost_nonwritable($pfhost['name']);
00174   }
00175 }
00176 ?>
